# sakura_subnet (Data Source)

Get information about an existing Subnet.

## Example Usage

```terraform
variable internet_id {}
data sakura_subnet "foobar" {
  internet_id = var.internet_id
  index       = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `index` (Number) The index of the subnet in assigned to the Internet(switch+router)
- `internet_id` (String) The id of the Internet(switch+router) resource that the Subnet belongs

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the Subnet.
- `zone` (String) The name of zone that the Subnet is in (e.g. `is1a`, `tk1a`)

### Read-Only

- `ip_addresses` (List of String) A list of assigned global address to the Subnet
- `max_ip_address` (String) Maximum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Subnet
- `min_ip_address` (String) Minimum IP address in assigned global addresses to the Subnet
- `netmask` (Number) The bit length of the subnet assigned to the Subnet
- `network_address` (String) The IPv4 network address assigned to the Subnet
- `next_hop` (String) The ip address of the next-hop at the Subnet
- `vswitch_id` (String) The id of the vSwitch connected from the Subnet
